Ingredients.7: 1 (12 ounce) box vanilla wafer cookies (such as Nilla®)

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a 9x13-inch pan with aluminum foil, making sure to cover the sides and leaving several inches of aluminum foil on each end.

Directions.2: Mix graham crackers and butter in a bowl until crackers are moist; pat down into the prepared pan.

Directions.3: Bake in preheated oven until firm, about 12 minutes. Set aside to cool.

Directions.4: Beat cream cheese in a bowl with an electric mixer until fluffy. Add sweetened condensed milk; continue beating until incorporated. Blend sour cream and lemon juice into the cream cheese mixture. Chill in refrigerator for 20 minutes.

Directions.5: Dip each vanilla wafer cookie in the brewed coffee for a few seconds and arrange in a layer onto the cooled crust with about 1/2 inch between each cookie. Spread about 1/3 of the cream cheese mixture over the cookies. Repeat layering of cookies and cream cheese mixture twice more.

Directions.6: Refrigerate until center is set, 2 1/2 to 3 hours.
